title: Visa Credit Card from Continental Finance
question: Continental Finance refused to find a payment I made after I sent them all of the info from my bank. They reported it to all 3 Credit Bureaus. I reported them to the FTC and also Michael Finney from 7 On Your Side. They refused to talk with them. What can I do?
answers:
You should dispute the debt with all three Credit Bureaus, in writing. Send them copies of the info from your bank. The Credit Bureaus have a legal obligation to investigate the dispute and let you know the results of the investigation.
